data.eml:eml: Contribution to the knowledge of seed-beetles (Coleoptera, Chrysomelidae, Bruchinae) in Xinjiang, China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, You, Wang, Zhiliang, Guo, Jianjun, Napoles, Jesus Romero, Ji, Yingchao, Jiang, Chunyan, Zhang, Runzhi (2014): Contribution to the knowledge of seed-beetles (Coleoptera, Chrysomelidae, Bruchinae) in Xinjiang, China. ZooKeys 466: 13-28, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.466.7283, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.466.7283
